Posts.Content: lauren1932 wrote: Hi all! I was diagnosed with BC when I was 31 - stage 2B. I had surgery, froze eggs, chemo, radiation. My hair grew back, but it's so thinner than it used to be. It makes me so sad - I think about it ALL the time. I know I need to just be thankful that I'm here but I can't help it. My wedding is in 2 weeks and I'm a wreck b/c I'm so nervous about how I will look. I actually got a really short haircut last summer b/c I couldn't stand how thin it felt. It's def thinner/weaker. And I used to love my hair :( Any advice/hope anyone can give me? :( Thank you <3 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Really need hope for my hair lauren1932 Beatmon
